Keys.Name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_COMMON_SETTINGS_TEXTSHOWN_NAME
Keys.Tip: This screensaver supports written text on file. Pass the complete file path to this field, and the screensaver will display the contents of the file appropriately.
